Package org.mockito

Mockito is a mock library for java - see Mockito class for for usage.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Strictly Allows strict order verification.
 

Class Summary
AdditionalMatchers See Matchers for general info about matchers.
CustomMatcher<T> Allows creating customized argument matchers.
Matchers Allow less constrained verification or stubbing.
Mockito Enables mocks creation, verification and stubbing.
 

Package org.mockito Description

Mockito is a mock library for java - see Mockito class for for usage.
